title: I'm Bullied Because I'm Home-Schooled
description:
The kids in Elliott's neighborhood have started teasing him for being home-schooled, including some that he thought were true friends. - Dr. Laura: "The smartest way to deal with mean people is to leave them alone."

Are you teaching your kids to handle bullies in the same or a different way than you did as a child? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

What should we do when we've been wronged? In "Surviving a Shark Attack (On Land)," I wrote about overcoming betrayal, humiliation, and pain, including how I've faced challenges in my own life. For a limited time, get the eBook for $1.99 when you click here - https://www.drlaura.com/dr-laura-book-surviving-a-shark-attack-on-land

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:
